attributes.action: Ban fireworks displays and being sold
attributes.additional_details: Safety for people , animals , nature and avoiding planet pollution with potential fires being caused.
attributes.background: Ban all fireworks and firework displays. They are dangerous for causing fires , harm to our wildlife, pets and general public, they cause harm to the environment and litter..

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for the same action:

Ban the sale of fireworks to the general public:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/639319
